sentences.en: Accident of this sort does unavoidably occur in cross - country shipping.
sentences.cn: 在跨国装运中,这类事故的发生是不可避免的.

sentences.en: But, unavoidably, taxes must also go up.
sentences.cn: 但不可避免的是税率必须要增加.

sentences.en: Disdainful, unavoidably cause psychological unbalance, blundering.
sentences.cn: 过分看重, 难免造成心理失衡, 心态浮躁.

sentences.en: Fran began her automatic patter about how Jon had been unavoidably detained.
sentences.cn: 弗兰开始不由自主地唠叨起乔恩是怎样无可避免地被扣留的。

sentences.en: However, there are risk factors unavoidably.
sentences.cn: 但是, 其中不可避免地存在着风险因素.

sentences.en: I have been unavoidably prevented from coming.
I unavoidably sigh for the difficulty to be a true man.
sentences.cn: 心里不免要感慨一番为人的不易.

sentences.en: I'm sorry I'm late; I was unavoidably detained.
sentences.cn: 对不起我迟到了, 我不得已地被留住了.

sentences.en: In some applications, this maximum voltage unavoidably exceeded.
sentences.cn: 在某些应用中, 不可避免地会超过这个最大的电压.

sentences.en: My memory unavoidably recurred to former times with a sort of oppressive sadness.
sentences.cn: 我不可避免地怀着一种压抑的悲哀回忆往日.

sentences.en: The agent's uncertainty of action will bring some risks to insurer unavoidably.
sentences.cn: 代理人行动的不确定性较大,不可避免地将给保险人带来某些风险.

sentences.en: The conflict of the class interests results in the pitiless class-struggle that unavoidably leads to the victory of the most numerous and most wronged class, the proletariat.
sentences.cn: 阶级利益的冲突导致了无情的阶级斗争，从而不可避免地导致了最广大的、最受虐待的阶级，即无产阶级的胜利。

sentences.en: The final journey, ends up to turn out orphaned shade accompanying unavoidably.
sentences.cn: 最后的旅途, 难免落得孤影相伴.

sentences.en: The operation unavoidably caused the patient much pain.
sentences.cn: 手术不免会导致病人更多的疼痛.

sentences.en: Thus the phenomenon that they are misused and confused occurs unavoidably.
sentences.cn: 既然同音词大量存在就不可避免地会发生混用误用的现象.

words.tran_cn: 不可避免的；不能废除的
